reviews.review: solid puzzle solver with a fun story.  I recommend playing Portal before playing this so you can get the whole story.

Unos de los mejores juegos de Valve para mi gusto.
Puzzbles: 10/10
Historia: 10/10
Coo-op: 10/10
Soundtrack: 10/10

Valve: 10/10
Holy fucking shit. I wish I could forget playing this game so that I could experience it all over again.
Genial juego de puzzles para jugar solo y en cooperativo.
es un juego interactivo bastante gracisoso si se juega con alguien mas.
Hahahahah funny portal game I shot portal and saw Richtofen through it. hmm wonder what was he doing tho...
10/10 game with a interesting plot, great characters and extremely fun and difficult puzzles
Zajebiste ale nie umiem w myślenie
One of the best games ever made.

Beautiful. The closest to a perfect game I think we can get. Nice characters, it's optimized well, good single and multi player content, workshop is still active, the list goes on. The problem with Portal 1 was that it was too short, but this game is long enough. And completing puzzles feel satisfying. I couldn't recommend this game enough.
good for fun and mods i recommend this  game 😀

만약 스팀유저중에 포탈을 안해본 사람이 있다면 그 사람은 이미 인생의 절반을 손해보고 있는 사람이 것이다.
포탈1은 간단하게 머리써서 재밌게 하는 느낌이라면 포탈2는 스토리와 기승전결이 말 그대로 완벽 그자체다.
또한 그와 더불어 플레이 타임, 이스터에그, 몰입도 모든게 완벽한 갓갓 게임이다. 세일할때 샀는데 진짜 장난안치고
 8만원이라도 살 수 있을 정도로 몰입감이 장난아니다. 실제로 포탈2를 플레이하고 몆일간 나무위키까지 뒤져가며 
포탈 TMI에 몰입한 나 자신을 볼 수 있었다. 포탈1은 대충 스토리만 들어도 되니까 포탈2는 꼭 사서 플레이 해봐야 한다고 생각한다.
Very good and fun puzzle game. A good progression of easy to difficult puzzles. only gripe i have with it is that it's somewhat short.
efsane oyun ama beyninizin 100% kulanmak zorundasını yoksa finişer
Me encantó este juego. Me encantó gastarme mi dinero en un juego que me haya gustado tanto. Probadlo.

A master piece and a damn good squeal. even 10 years later this game holds up in graphics, story and gameplay. An art piece and a gem to be remembered and kept for old times. a replay of this for a its 10 year anniversary made my entire week, and filled me with memories of nostalgia. 10/10
Every friend I've played this game with I've lost./ 10/10 would pay another friendship.
i finished it and now i feel sad because i finished it

OH my god this game is a hell of a rollercoaster, i just finished it and i was laughing the whole time i played it.
Between the well made puzzles and the plots twists that left me on edge even while the credits were playing, i can only recommend this game to all of you!

Also i really love wheatley, that AI is hilarious
Interesting for a beginning gamer.  I'm much older than most but a great starter for us oldies
Portal 2 ist besser als sein Vorgänger. Der Koopmodus ist eine nette Dreingabe. Die Sprecher sind alle fantastisch. Klare Empfehlung.
Jogo totalmente imersivo, com uma história extremamente bem trabalhada, e gráficos muito bons, além de um preço acessível, recomendo para qualquer pessoa.
Good game, however, shouldn't be spent 4766 hours in it!
This game is excellent at working the old grey matter and also has an intriguing story to boot!
